name: Rising Storm 2: Vietnam - Pulling Rank Cosmetic DLC
Sokobond
description: Sokobond es un juego de puzles sobre química diseñado con elegancia.

name: Winter Falling: Battle Tactics
description: Lead troops in tense tactical battles, just you and your brain against the world. Manage a mercenary company, scavenge supplies, build an army. Go on a quest! Burn down a village or two... Maybe save the world in a story inspired by Discworld. Gameplay influenced by Warhammer, FTL and Total War.

name: Wargame: European Escalation
description: The New Fatal Error DLC includes a new 5-mission Operation and touch-screen controls.

name: Into the Necrovale
description: Into the Necrovale es un RPG de acción en el que coleccionas objetos poderosos que interactúan entre sí. Debes ser astuto con tu construcción si esperas descifrar los misterios y peligros del Necrovale, donde han sido desterradas mil generaciones de maleantes y criminales.

name: Zombie Night Terror
description: ¡Prepárate para la noche más emocionante de tu vida! Algo extraño ha sucedido y la gente está transformándose en cuerpos andantes sedientos de sangre. ¿Pero adivinas quién es el cerebro detrás de este ejército de ansiosos muertos vivientes? ¡TÚ! Así que expande esta epidemia para borrar a la humanidad de este planeta.

name: Rusted Warfare - RTS
description: {{An RTS inspired by the classics of the past!}} Making up for it's subpar retro graphics with fun gameplay and modern multi-threaded tech enabling huge battles to run smooth... Featuring singleplayer challenges, skirmish, sandbox, 10-player multiplayer & workshop modding.

name: Epic Battle Fantasy 5
description: Una aventura RPG por turnos, llena de referencias a videojuegos, diálogo juvenil, anime y mucho fanservice... ¡Y también combate estratégico, captura de monstruos y muchos tesoros por encontrar!

name: Alchemist Shop Simulator
description: Conquista el mercado arcano en Alchemist Shop Simulator! Establece tu propia tienda mágica, llena de maravillas. Experimenta con ingredientes comprados o cultivados en tu jardín para elaborar pociones para tu peculiar clientela. Compra barato, vende caro, ¡haz que tu tienda sea legendaria!

name: Enigmatis 3: The Shadow of Karkhala
description: Enigmatis 3: La sombra del Karkhala, es el desenlace de esta exitosa trilogía. Una emocionante historia detectivesca con aventuras, acertijos por resolver y un antiguo misterio. Sigue la pista a un demoniaco predicador y descubre los secretos del pico Karkhala.

name: Tiny Light
description: 《荧火微光》是一款文字冒险（AVG）游戏，游戏将通过多人视角讲述一个成长故事，在游戏中，每一个选择都至关重要，众人的结局将由你来决定。

name: Dungeon Journey
description: Fight your way through thousands floors of dungeons. Get precious treasures and slay undead creatures of hell to make your character stronger.

name: Will Glow the Wisp
description: Navega por laberintos psicodélicos al ritmo de ritmos eléctricos. Imagina una mezcla entre Super Meat Boy y Geometry Wars.

name: The Overseer
description: You are an Overseer on duty. Cycle through the camera feeds looking for anomalies. Upon finding one, report it quickly. Too many anomalies can lead to severe distortions in reality and result in deaths, including yours.

name: Supaplex
description: The legendary game. One of the best action-puzzle games in the world!

name: Spider Queen cave
description: The student sister who has been secretly in love for a long time has been missing for three months. Tonight, my sister suddenly called and asked me to go to an abandoned villa in the suburbs. I have no choice but to prepare for departure. It is said that the villa is a famous and dangerous house.

name: Hunter: The Reckoning — The Beast of Glenkildove
description: Full moon. Cold night. Dark shadow. Warm gun. The Beast of Glenkildove has stalked Ireland for centuries. Now, you must hunt it. A text-based interactive novel set in the World of Darkness.

name: Asteroid Bounty Hunter
description: Asteroid Bounty Hunter is a space shooter mixed with interesting boss fights and breathtaking visuals, with a reward system to take your skill to another level.

name: The Enjenir: The Engineering Physics Building Simulator
description: En este desenfadado juego de construcción basado en la física, eres un torpe ingeniero. El juego combina la construcción sin cuadrículas con divertidos controles físicos en tercera persona. Con infinitas posibilidades de diseño de estructuras, el único límite es tu imaginación... ¡ah, y la gravedad!

name: Potato Party: Hash It Out
description: Prepare to laugh when you and your friends gather (virtually or physically) for this quick-draw asymmetrical VR game! Be the artist in VR, or guess what's being drawn as one of 1-8 challengers with the free iOS/Android app. Just don't eat the artist.

name: The Political Process
description: Explore a dynamic world of politics in this turn-based, political simulator. Create a character, run for political office, write legislation, balance budgets, and more as you move up the political hierarchy.

name: Two Souls
description: Two Souls is a gripping 2D platformer that pushes the boundaries of skill and precision. Immerse yourself in a world, offering an intense and challenging gaming experience. Prepare to face the ultimate platforming challenge!

name: Card Survival: Fantasy Forest
description: Card Survival: Fantasy Forest is a card-based deep survival simulator and the next installment in the Card Survival Series. Carve yourself a home in a primordial forest that has a will of its own. A day-to-day life simulator in a world where nature reigns with mystery, beauty and sometimes cruelty.

name: Ultimate Admiral: Age of Sail - Barbary War (FREE for EA buyers)
Mini Cozy Room: Lo-Fi
description: ¡Decora tu acogedor espacio de trabajo! 『Mini Cozy Room : Lo-Fi』 es un juego de productividad que combina música relajante Lo-Fi y decoración de habitaciones. Lindos avatares y mascotas te acompañan, mientras temporizadores Pomodoro, notas y listas de tareas mejoran tu eficacia.

name: Gallery: Coloring book & decor
description: Gallery: Libro de colorear, de Beresnev Games, es un juego dos en uno que combina mecánicas de colorear por números y diseño de interiores con una buena historia.

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Street Art Paint Jobs Pack
Pesterquest
description: Embárcate en una misión de proporciones épicas con Pesterquest, una novela visual cuquitenebrosa por capítulos basada en el universo de Homestuck/Hiveswap, obra del autor y artista estadounidense Andrew Hussie. Disfruta del ambiente oscuro y de sus característicos toques de humor negro.

name: Black Jack Story
description: In the game, you act as a participant in a large card tournament "Golden Skull", held among the best players from all over the world.

name: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero Ultimate Edition
description: ¡La edición definitiva de Shantae: Half-Genie Hero llega con todos los DLC anteriormente publicados, Modos y Trajes en una colección épica! ¡Incluye un exclusivo Traje de Baño Azul para usarlo en el Modo Playa!

name: Aerofly FS 4 Flight Simulator - Aircraft AddOn
5-in-1 Pack - Monument Builders: Destination USA
description: Build the most famous monuments of United States of America in this bundle of 5 time management games !

name: Neighbours from Hell Compilation
description: INTRODUCING THE GAME OF NEIGHBOURHOOD NASTINESS AND COMMUNITY COMMOTION! Living next door to you is a real Neighbour From Hell and it's now time to have your revenge! This compilation includes the original Neighbours From Hell and it's sequel Neighbours from Hell 2: On Vacation.

name: Journey to the Center of the Earth
description: Ariane, a young reporter, is suddenly swallowed by the earth while covering a story near the Sneffels volcano. When she awakens, she discovers the strangest landscapes and a host of unusual objects. Join Ariane as she explores an unkown world of fascinating and fantastical civilizations hidden beneath the surface of the Earth.

name: Solasta: Crown of the Magister - Primal Calling
Kitsune Kitchen
description: Play through the story of a young man’s quest to create the ultimate BLT sandwich.

name: Red Matter
description: Red Matter es una aventura de puzzle de RV basada en una historia que se desarrolla durante una distópica Guerra Fría de ciencia ficción. Asume el papel del agente Epsilon, un astronauta de la Unión Atlántica enviado a una base lunar abandonada de Volgravia en un planeta congelado y lejano.

name: Lingo
description: Lingo is a first person word puzzle game with a large, abstract world to explore. With its epiphany-driven gameplay and impossible geometry, Lingo provides a unique and nonlinear experience.

name: DREAMING CITY
description: Explore the mysteries of your soul to discover whether you're melancholic, choleric, sanguine, or phlegmatic. Each decision reflects your inner world, challenging your perception and revealing the hidden depths of your personality in this journey of self-discovery.

name: The Castles of Burgundy
description: El famoso juego de tablero de Ravensburger, diseñado por el gran Stefan Feld.

name: Turbo Overkill
description: Enter Paradise as Johnny Turbo—half-metal, half-human, all-murder machine. Clean up the streets with a chainsaw leg, 15+ weapons and your hovercar as you battle the rogue AI Syn, rival bounty hunters and cyberpunks aplenty. Apogee’s most outrageous FPS since Duke Nukem 3D. Good hunting, Sir!

name: Angel Wings: Endless Night
description: Trapped in a haunted mansion with only your wits and an unlikely ally at your side, what will it take to survive this endless nightmare?

name: Realm of Ink
description: Realm of Ink is an Ink-style action Roguelite game. While pursuing the Fox Demon, the swordswoman Red, unexpectedly finds that her life is dictated by the 'destiny' within the world of the book. Only by breaking free can she unveil the truth of her existence and challenge the constraints of fate.

name: Secrets of Grindea
description: Secrets of Grindea is an old-school Action RPG with co-op support for up to 4 players. Journey through fantastical lands and battle tons of different enemies and bosses in your quest for truth, friendship and, above all, finding the world’s rarest treasures!

name: Midnight Mysteries
description: Eres un famoso escritor de novelas de misterios. Estabas buscando tu próximo caso cuando, de repente, te llega una invitación inesperada de parte del mismísimo fantasma de Edgar Allan Poe. Recoge pistas, entrevista a testigos y trata de encajar todas las piezas para resolver la conspiración que hay tras la misteriosa muerte del escritor.

name: 学生时代
description: 《学生时代》，一款高自由的校园养成游戏。夏日西瓜、午后吊扇和悸动的心拉你重回千禧年初。学习、锻炼、恋爱，你是要复刻曾经的成长之路，还是活出不一样的人生？12年后，你的未来如何，由你来决定！

name: Gas Station Simulator - Can Touch This DLC
Cooking Trip
description: Cooking Trip – walk the path to perfection. Fulfill your dream and become a great chef!

name: Farmer's Life - Pimp my Cottage DLC
The Light Brigade
description: Un juego de tiro roguelike donde el uso de armas es realista y la magia es envolvente. Asciende los rangos de el Light Brigade, recorriendo recuerdos destruidos para regresar la luz a la oscuridad.

name: Pandaty
description: Pandaty is 2D Cute Platformer Game, Explore this sweet world of adventure!

name: Path of Kung Fu-Deluxe Edition DLC
Synth Riders
description: ¡Deja que la música te guíe en Synth Riders, un juego de acción y baile rítmico con soporte oficial para canciones personalizadas y una comunidad en línea cada vez más grande!

name: HAAK
description: HAAK is a Metroidvania-Platformer. As the mysterious wanderer Haak, you embarked on an epic expedition across the vast cyber-wasteland to find your lost brother. Explore deserted cities and metro, refine your weapons and hack skills, and uncover the secrets behind metal and dust.

name: Lost in Vivo
description: A horror game about claustrophobia. During a storm your service dog is forced down a broken sewer drain. You find the nearest sewer entrance and run in after it. Along the way you will meet others that are also stricken by abnormal or psychological fear.

name: Wars Across The World
description: WAW es un juego único de estrategia histórica por turnos, con alma de juego de mesa, cuyo objetivo es simular en un solo sistema TODO tipo de guerras y conflictos en todo el mundo (y más allá) desde la Prehistoria hasta la actualidad, en los niveles operativo o estratégico

name: The House of Da Vinci 2
description: Conviértete en aprendiz del famoso Leonardo da Vinci. Resuelve puzles mecánicos en 3D creados de forma artesanal y descubre secretos ocultos. Visita lugares fascinantes de la Italia del Renacimiento. Viaja en el tiempo para influir en tu entorno.

name: SMIB: Mission Cure
description: SMIB is a small robot with a big problem. Humankind can’t smile anymore and sent SMIB to space to find the cure. It needs YOU to remotely program its routes in its biggest mission: an adventure through the most exotic planets in the Universe. Solve puzzles, find the cure, and get SMIB back to Earth!

name: Shaolin vs Wutang 2
description: The sequel to Shaolin vs Wutang! Shaolin vs Wutang 2 is a INDIE love letter to Martial Arts and classic Kung Fu films. Made for casual game fans not intended for Hardcore Fighting Game players.

name: Faerie Solitaire Harvest
description: Match cards, rescue Faeries, and raise Magical Pets as you explore the many and vast enchanted worlds of Faerie Solitaire Harvest!

name: Ghost of a Tale
description: Eres Tilo, un valeroso bardo ratón en una arriesgada misión para encontrar al amor de tu vida. Usa toda tu cautela e inteligencia para explorar la Fortaleza de los Altos Derruina de las torres más altas a las mazmorras más profundas, evadiendo sus peligros y descubriendo sus secretos más antiguos.

name: Goat's Tale 2
description: ¡La Cabra está de vuelta en su próxima aventura! El reto será difícil, pero sólo con tu ayuda podrá llegar a la cima.

name: Kitsune Tails
description: Run, jump, and dash across a land inspired by Japanese mythology and untangle the love triangle between three young women on a journey of self discovery. Explore the complicated relationships between kitsune and humans through classic platforming action.

name: CULTIC
description: Death is only the beginning. Crawl from your grave and gear up to fight your way through the ranks of a mysterious and twisted cult. You, your guns, and your dynamite will have to shoot, slide, blast, duck, dodge, and maybe throw a gib or two to survive in this old-school-inspired shooter.

name: Topple Tactics
description: Topple Tactics is a physics-based multiplayer tower defense game where one huge player controls the map by placing towers and using abilities, whilst the little players level up their stats and equipment to reach the end of the map and defeat the huge player!

name: MASKA
description: Welcome to the new virtual reality! Metaverse Maska is a home to interesting people, fun parties, exploration and fulfilling relationships! You create your own world, from your unique persona to their exciting adventures.

name: That Dragon, Cancer
description: An immersive, narrative videogame that retells Joel Green’s 4-year fight against cancer through about two hours of poetic, imaginative gameplay that explores themes of faith, hope and love.

name: Touhou Luna Nights
description: Touhou Luna Nights is a Metroidvania title with a heavy emphasis on exploration and action.　 Developed by Team Ladybug, creators of multiple fantastic action games thus far.
